mapper.select: select s.*, ds.ds_name ,ds.ds_type from t_data_schema s, t_dbus_datasource ds where s.ds_id = ds.id and s.ds_id = #{dsId} and s.schema_name like "%"#{schemaName}"%" order by s.create_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into t_data_schema (ds_id, schema_name, status, src_topic, target_topic, create_time, description) values (#{dsId}, #{schemaName}, #{status}, #{srcTopic}, #{targetTopic}, current_timestamp(), #{description})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
mapper.update: update t_data_schema set ds_id = #{dsId}, schema_name = #{schemaName}, status = #{status}, src_topic = #{srcTopic}, target_topic = #{targetTopic}, description = #{description}, create_time = current_timestamp() where ds_id =#{dsId} and schema_name = #{schemaName}
mapper.delete: delete ts,tt,tc,tv,tm from t_data_schema ts left join t_data_tables tt on ts.id = tt.schema_id left join t_encode_columns tc on tt.id=tc.table_id left join t_meta_version tv on tt.id = tv.table_id left join t_table_meta tm on tv.id = tm.ver_id where ts.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select d.ds_type,d.ds_name,s.* from t_data_schema s,t_dbus_datasource d where s.ds_id = d.id and s.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update t_data_schema s set s.status='inactive' where s.ds_id = #{dsId}
